remarks:
The Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz.  See ~ loowoz for an alternate axiom.  (Contributed by Mel L. O'Cat, 12-Aug-2004.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) 

---

 The Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz.  (Contributed by O'Cat, 12-Aug-2004.)
statement: loolin $p |- ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ps -> ph ) ) -> ( ps -> ph ) ) $.
